posts.post_content:
Hello, Card is sold, thank you!
I have an SGC Authentic Tim Keefe OJ.  This card looks like it was removed from a scrapbook which resulted in major back damage.  The damage also went through to the front of the card, with resulted in some rips along the bottom border.

I would be interested in trading this card for a low grade Cobb, maybe something along the lines of a W572 in the SGC 20 range.  I am open to offers for just about any Cobb, except for the 4 T206's, and the 33 Sport Kings.  

If I can't work out a trade this card is for sale for $325 shipped and insured.  Send me a pm or email at [url]rickmcquillan@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks,
Rick
